data.name: hexceed - Stella Pack
data.detailed_description:
Stella

The first DLC world for hexceed, unlocking the exciting new world: Stella!

Enjoy a new world filled with new puzzles to complete!

With 110 new levels to complete, and thousands of hexes to solve, this world promises to bring you hours of relaxing puzzle solving!
data.about_the_game:
Stella

data.short_description: The first DLC world for hexceed, unlocking the exciting new world: Stella! Enjoy a new world filled with new puzzles to complete!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
